name: Darklord Pleasure
text: Fusion Summon 1 DARK Fairy Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing its materials from your hand, field, and/or GY, and if you do, it gains 1000 ATK. If Summoning a "Darklord" monster this way, you can also use "Darklord" monsters your opponent controls as material. You can only activate 1 "Darklord Pleasure" per turn.
